snippet: Speaking in personal terms about the murder of her father, Caroline Kennedy recognized Gabrielle Giffords, who was shot in 2011 and has backed tougher gun laws.
abstract: Caroline Kennedy bestows on former Rep Gabrielle Giffords the Profile in Courage Award in small ceremony at John F Kennedy Presidential Library and Museum; Giffords has devoted herself to pressing for gun control measures.
lead_paragraph: Speaking in personal terms about the murder of her father, Caroline Kennedy recognized Gabrielle Giffords, who was shot in 2011 and has backed tougher gun laws.

headline.seo: Kennedy Library Gives Giffords a Courage Award
headline.main: Kennedy Library Gives Courage Award to Giffords
headline.print_headline: Kennedy Library Gives Courage Award to Giffords

keywords.value: Kennedy, John F, Library and Museum
keywords.name: organizations
